questions.title: B1 Title of Project
questions.description: Provide the working title of your study.

questions.title: B2 Authors
questions.help: Jimmy Stewart, Ava Gardner, Bob Hope, Greta Garbo

questions.title: B3 Acknowledgements
questions.help: Jimmy Stewart, Ava Gardner, Bob Hope, Greta Garbo

questions.title: B4 Is one of the study authors a university faculty member?
B5 Is this Registration Prospective or Retrospective?
options: Registration prior to any research activities
Registration prior to assignment of treatment
Registration prior to realization of outcomes
Registration prior to researcher access to outcome data
Registration prior to researcher analysis of outcome data
Registration after researcher analysis of outcome data

questions.title: B6 Is this an experimental study?
questions.description: (with random assignment of units to different conditions)

questions.title: B7 Date of start of study
questions.description: Understood as first date of treatment assignment or equivalent for observational study

questions.title: B8 Should this study be gated? (discouraged)
questions.description: If Yes, indicate release date (studies can be gated for up to 18 months or the date of publication, if earlier). We discourage gating but sometimes this is necessary to protect subjects or the integrity of the research. If the study should not be gated, please LEAVE THIS FIELD BLANK.

questions.title: B9 Was this design presented at an EGAP meeting?
questions.description: Indicate if the design received feedback from a EGAP design workshop or other special EGAP session prior to registration

questions.title: B10 Is there a pre-analysis plan associated with this registration?
questions.nav: Pre-analysis plan associated with this registration?
questions.description: If so, please attach it in the Additional Documentation section below

questions.title: C1 Background and explanation of rationale.
questions.description: Brief description of goals of project. If you are also attaching a pre-analysis plan, please refrain from simply copying and pasting a section from your plan here. If possible, please also avoid saying "see attached pre-analysis plan," as it renders the search functionality less useful. Rather, please provide a short (1-2 paragraph) summary of the project background.

questions.title: Text format
questions.help:
Plain Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • No HTML tags allowed.
  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.
Filter Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • Allowed HTML tags: <a> <em> <strong> <cite> <blockquote> <code> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd>
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.

questions.title: C2 What are the hypotheses to be tested/quantities of interest to be estimated?
questions.description: Please list the hypotheses including hypotheses on heterogeneous effects. If you are also attaching a pre-analysis plan, please refrain from simply copying and pasting a section from your plan here. If possible, please also avoid saying "see attached pre-analysis plan," as it renders the search functionality less useful. Rather, please provide a short (1-2 paragraph) summary of project hypotheses.

questions.title: Text format
questions.help:
Plain Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • No HTML tags allowed.
  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.
Filter Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • Allowed HTML tags: <a> <em> <strong> <cite> <blockquote> <code> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd>
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.

questions.nav: How will these hypotheses be tested?
questions.title: C3 How will these hypotheses be tested?
questions.description: Brief description of your methodology. If you are also attaching a pre-analysis plan, please refrain from simply copying and pasting a section from your plan here. If possible, please also avoid saying "see attached pre-analysis plan," as it renders the search functionality less useful. Rather, please provide a short (1-2 paragraph) summary of project methodology.

questions.title: Text format
questions.help:
Plain Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • No HTML tags allowed.
  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.
Filter Text:
  • Use [fn]...[/fn] (or ...) to insert automatically numbered footnotes.
  • Allowed HTML tags: <a> <em> <strong> <cite> <blockquote> <code> <ul> <ol> <li> <dl> <dt> <dd>
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.

questions.title: C4 Country
questions.help: comma separated names of countries (e.g. Canada, United States of America, Mexico)

questions.title: C6 Was a power analysis conducted prior to data collection?
questions.nav: Power analysis conducted prior to data collection?

questions.title: C7 Has this research received Institutional Review Board (IRB) or ethics committee approval?
questions.nav: Review Board (IRB) or ethics committee approval?

questions.title: C10 Will the intervention be implemented by the researcher or a third party? If a third party, please provide the name.
questions.nav: Review Board (IRB) or ethics committee approval?

questions.title: C11 Did any of the research team receive remuneration from the implementing agency for taking part in this research?
C12 If relevant, is there an advance agreement with the implementation group that all results can be published?
questions.nav: is there an advance agreement with the implementation group that all results can be published?

questions.title: C13 JEL classification(s)
questions.description: Please list any relevant classifications from the Journal of Economic Literature. If multiple classifications, separate by commas (e.g. D31, C19, F22)

questions.title: Keywords for Methodology
questions.description: Choose one or more categories that describe your study methodology.

questions.title: Keywords for Policy
questions.description: Choose one or more categories that describe your study's policy.

questions.title: Certification
questions.description: By submitting this form and accompanying documents with EGAP, I confirm that I have rights to put this information in the public domain and I understand that this information will remain on the EGAP registry in perpetuity, regardless of whether the research is subsequently implemented or not.

questions.title: Confirmation
questions.description: You should receive a confirmation of your registration within three business days. Your registration is considered complete only when confirmation is received. If you do not receive confirmation within three business days please contact paps@egap.org.

questions.title: Additional Documentation
questions.description: Please upload your pre-analysis plan, along with any other supporting documents, such as survey instrument, research protocol, any data, etc.

questions.title: Anonymous Documentation
questions.description: Please upload your pre-analysis plan, along with any other supporting documents, such as survey instrument, research protocol, any data, etc.
